name: Box Party
storyline:
You're invited to the biggest party of the year!

But the food has gone bad, and they're threatening to crash the party, forever!
It's up to you to stop them before it's too late!
summary:
Box Party is a cartoony retro FPS where you shoot foods and go to parties.

Along the way you'll find cool weapons to use, fellow partygoers to talk to, optional side quests to complete, and more importantly, plenty of food to fight.
